name: UOA-ESRG
tagline: University of Auckland Embedded Systems Research Group
body:
### Welcome.
We are a group of PhD students (and academic staff) in the [Electrical and Computer Engineering Department](http://www.ece.auckland.ac.nz/en.html) at the University of Auckland, New Zealand. We have a broad variety of research interests, ranging from computer architecture to formal methods to security. However, everything we do is applied to embedded systems - computers with dedicated functions within a larger mechanical or electrical system, characterised by constrained computing resources and real-time computing requirements.

### Group Members
Nathan Allen - Bioelectronics Modelling
nall426@aucklanduni.ac.nz

Andrew Chen - Embedded Vision
andrew.chen@auckland.ac.nz

Ryan Kurte - Wireless Sensor Networks
rkur014@aucklanduni.ac.nz

Hammond Pearce - Timing Predictability and Modelling
hpea485@aucklanduni.ac.nz

Zac Roberts - Sensor Network Virtualisation
zrob005@aucklanduni.ac.nz

Benjamin Tan - Hardware Security
ptan262@aucklanduni.ac.nz
